unnormalised: ## Chai & Chat: Spilling the Bollywood Masala!
normalised: ## Chai and Chat: Spilling the Bollywood Masala!

unnormalised: Namaste, Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai, because we're diving deep into the latest *garma-garam* gossip from B-town.
normalised: Namaste, Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai, because we are diving deep into the latest garma-garam gossip from B-town.

unnormalised: First up, sources say that Ranveer "Baba" Singh was spotted having dinner with Deepika Padukone at a cozy Bandra restaurant. Paparazzi pics showed them laughing and sharing biryani – talk about couple goals! Are wedding bells ringing again, folks? We can only speculate!
normalised: First up, sources say that Ranveer "Baba" Singh was spotted having dinner with Deepika Padukone at a cozy Bandra restaurant. Paparazzi pics showed them laughing and sharing biryani – talk about couple goals! Are wedding bells ringing again, folks? We can only speculate!

unnormalised: Then there's the buzz around Alia Bhatt. Apparently, she's been hitting the gym hard, and insiders are whispering that she's prepping for a new action role. Could this be her chance to become the next female action star, like a desi Lara Croft? We’re here for it!
normalised: Then there is the buzz around Alia Bhatt. Apparently, she has been hitting the gym hard, and insiders are whispering that she is prepping for a new action role. Could this be her chance to become the next female action star, like a desi Lara Croft? We are here for it!

unnormalised: And oh my god, have you seen the latest Insta post from Priyanka Chopra? She was rocking a Manish Malhotra saree at a Diwali party in L.A. Seriously, how does she always look so flawless? International queen, am I right?
normalised: And oh my god, have you seen the latest Insta post from Priyanka Chopra? She was rocking a Manish Malhotra saree at a Diwali party in L A. Seriously, how does she always look so flawless? International queen, am I right?

unnormalised: Speaking of Diwali, rumours are swirling that Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora might have celebrated the festival in Goa, far away from the prying eyes of Mumbai. Talk about a romantic getaway! But seriously, are they or aren't they getting married soon? Place your bets, people!
normalised: Speaking of Diwali, rumours are swirling that Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora might have celebrated the festival in Goa, far away from the prying eyes of Mumbai. Talk about a romantic getaway! But seriously, are they or aren't they getting married soon? Place your bets, people!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, the grapevine is saying that Karan Johar is planning a massive Bollywood bash after the release of his next film. Expect all the big names to be there, dressed to the nines. We're talking red carpets, designer outfits, and probably some serious drama. Can't wait for the inside scoop!
normalised: Meanwhile, the grapevine is saying that Karan Johar is planning a massive Bollywood bash after the release of his next film. Expect all the big names to be there, dressed to the nines. We are talking red carpets, designer outfits, and probably some serious drama. Can't wait for the inside scoop!

unnormalised: Also, word on the street is that Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput were recently spotted house hunting in South Mumbai. Seems like they're ready to upgrade their pad. Wonder if they're looking for a place with a bigger balcony – perfect for enjoying the Mumbai monsoons!
normalised: Also, word on the street is that Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput were recently spotted house hunting in South Mumbai. Seems like they are ready to upgrade their pad. Wonder if they are looking for a place with a bigger balcony – perfect for enjoying the Mumbai monsoons!

unnormalised: Finally, rumours suggest that Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal spent Onam together with Vicky's family. Looks like their love is only getting stronger!
normalised: Finally, rumours suggest that Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal spent Onam together with Vicky's family. Looks like their love is only getting stronger!

unnormalised: That's all for now, folks! Keep your eyes peeled and your ears open for more Bollywood buzz. Until next time, keep sipping that chai and stay tuned!
normalised: That is all for now, folks! Keep your eyes peeled and your ears open for more Bollywood buzz. Until next time, keep sipping that chai and stay tuned!
